Once the edit period has expired, authors may update their posts by removing and reposting them.To read more about editing your posts, please follow this link: http://www.tripadvisor.com/help/how_to_edit_your_postsRemoved on: 8:33 pm, March 26, 2020
Really?????????Have you seen the news Or checked the coronavirus figures

I'm not sure you'll get any encouragement here Mike. I guess people will tell you to check on the latest Cancun forum posts to get an idea of what's the current situation.True, a lot can happen in a month, but it looks like in April you'd be sailing to a desolate no man's land and worst of all, without much alcohol. The curfews will increase most likely and travel will continue to taper to the most essential.
